hero.title: Parcel delivery
hero.desc: Enjoy a fast and reliable delivery service that ensures your shipments arrive safely and on time

parcelDesc.title: Deliver packages quickly and safely to your customer
parcelDesc.desc: Parcel delivery service offers you an easy, safe way to send any package from point to another, with full tracking for every step. We receive, prepare, transport, then deliver to the desired destination accurately and on time. The service suits any activity needing reliable, fast transport solutions without any complexity

parcelFeatures.title: Discover why Femex is your top choice for parcel delivery

desc.descOne: Fast delivery within the same day or within 24-48 hours
desc.descTwo: Professional drivers trained to handle sensitive shipments
desc.descThree: SMS/WhatsApp notifications upon pickup and delivery
desc.descFour: Hand delivered with electronic signature upon receipt
